A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every single piece of story that has been opened up in Episode 7 has been thrown into the trash with nothing left for a good finale. Dumb slapstick comedy and stupid jokes a la Yo mama\" and horrible scenes like Leias Space Float make this Star Wars the worst since Episode 2. Every single fan theory would have brought more to the story than this. 2 and a half hours of nothingness storywise. The only thing that actually happened was the death of two main\" characters.
